title: Indian recipes in Hindi, English,Gujarati, Marathi
description:
BetterButter is an Indian recipe app with over 150000 recipes and videos. It especially caters to the needs of the Indian cooks. Whether you are a busy mom looking for a quick to prepare food, a first-time cook who wants to learn an easy recipe.
Some of the features of BetterButter:
- Huge collection of recipes from all over India.
- App has recipes not only in English but also in 6 other regional languages - Hindi, Gujarati, Marathi, Tamil, Telugu and Bengali.
- All recipes are added by users and tested by our team.
- With in app search functionality, you can filter what you are looking for.
description_html:
BetterButter is an Indian recipe app with over 150000 recipes and videos. It especially caters to the needs of the Indian cooks. Whether you are a busy mom looking for a quick to prepare food, a first-time cook who wants to learn an easy recipe.

Some of the features of BetterButter:

- Huge collection of recipes from all over India.
- App has recipes not only in English but also in 6 other regional languages - Hindi, Gujarati, Marathi, Tamil, Telugu and Bengali.
- All recipes are added by users and tested by our team.
- With in app search functionality, you can filter what you are looking for.
